bibl.title: The Morphology and Syntax of a Demotic Debt Construction.
bibl.note: I. What is jw in iwk.k m-s3.y ""you hold a claim against me"" r ""to (do this or that)"" or n ""in regard to (this or that)"": Present state of the discussion. - II. What is the preposition preceding infintives that follow jw.k m s3.y? - III. What is jw in jw.k m s3.y ""you hold a claim against me"" r ""to (do this or that)"" or n ""in regard to (this or that)"": A new approach.
bibl.seg: Leo Depuydt, The Morphology and Syntax of a Demotic Debt Construction.
Fayza Haikal (ed.), Mélanges offerts à Ola el-Aguizy = Bibliothèque d'étude. 164 (Le Caire, 2015) pp. 101-111.

I. What is jw in iwk.k m-s3.y ""you hold a claim against me"" r ""to (do this or that)"" or n ""in regard to (this or that)"": Present state of the discussion. - II. What is the preposition preceding infintives that follow jw.k m s3.y? - III. What is jw in jw.k m s3.y ""you hold a claim against me"" r ""to (do this or that)"" or n ""in regard to (this or that)"": A new approach.
